summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 MERCURY GRAND MARQUIS. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE CLIMATE CONTROL DIAL FAILED AND AS A RESULT HE WAS UNABLE TO ADJUST THE TEMPERATURE IN THE VEHICLE AND THE DIRECTION HE WANTED THE AIR TO BE DIRECTED TOO. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER. THE TECHNICIAN DIAGNOSED THAT THE HEATER BOX NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 39,000 AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 58,000. ..UPDATED 02-28-14 *BF   UPDATED 03/14/2014    *JS
